answers.answer: if you already have diabetes, how would you develop it?  It is my understanding that gestational diabetes is something you have only while pregnant.  I do not have diabetes but everytime i am pregnant i get gestational diabetes.  I would think your dr would be working w/ you to make sure that you have controlled diabetes as i am sure there are still things you will want to be informed about being pregnant w/ diabetes.

I am a type 2 diabetic.  I'm presently taking insulin since finding out I was pregnant.  but what my girlfriend said about developing gestational diabetes when i am already a diabetic didn't make sense.
yeah, that doesnt make sense.  if you never had diabetes and then get it when you are prego is considered gestational.  :) best wishes for a healthy and happy pregnancy

question: Okay, I'm curious.  I am type 2 diabetic and 8 wks pregnant.  My girlfriend told me that I still can develop gestational diabetes during this pregnancy.  This is my first time hearing something like this.  Can this really happen?
title: Question about Gestational Diabtes
